metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22752 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-22752` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 96.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
firefox-geckodriver - 96.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 96.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '96.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1').
